REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0800 reute r f BC-COMAIR-<COMR>-FEBRUAR 03-09 0090

TEXT.TITLE: COMAIR <COMR> FEBRUARY LOAD FACTOR FALLS
TEXT.BODY: Comair Inc said February load factor fell to 34.6 pct from 38.0 pct a year before. The company said revenue passenger miles rose 9.5 pct to 10.9 mln from 9,962,399 a year before and available seat miles rose 20.3 pct to 31.5 mln from 26.2 mln. For the year to date, it said load factor fell to 36.2 pct from 40.3 pct a year before, as revenue passenger miles rose 3.3 pct to 119.1 mln from 115.3 mln and available seat miles rose 15.0 pct to 328.5 mln from 285.7 mln. Reuter
